summary: With a perk makes any of the mage armor spells add 10% of their enhancement to your unarmed attacks.
descriptionHtml:
The Mage Fist perk is located in the Alteration tree requiring Novice alteration and skill level 20.  It does stack with the Mage Armor perks.  This isn\'t meant to fix everything, just allow a possible path to playing a monk.

To Install just use the mod manager or download manager and unzip to your Skyrim data folder.

This is my first mod and I need to know how well it works so feedback is appreciated.

Future plans:  
Making the unarmed attacks with this perk level Alteration
More perk support for Mages going hand to hand, unarmored
Spell support
Nordic Martial Arts
author: SamuraiMcNinja
